description: Clubs pay tribute to Spanish midfielder Nico Hidalgo, who has died aged 32 after being diagnosed with lung cancer.
title: Nico Hidalgo: Clubs pay tribute after Spanish midfielder dies of lung cancer aged 32
title_page: Nico Hidalgo: Clubs pay tribute after Spanish midfielder dies of lung cancer aged 32 - BBC Sport
